Package com.limelight.server

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.limelight.server.MainController
  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(path="/app",
                method=GET)
public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    The main controller that processes all GET and POST requests pertaining to users and user attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • signUp

        @PostMapping(path="/signup")
@ResponseBody
public java.lang.Integer signUp​(@RequestParam
                                java.lang.String userName,
                                @RequestParam
                                java.lang.String firstName,
                                @RequestParam
                                java.lang.String lastName,
                                @RequestParam
                                java.lang.String email,
                                @RequestParam
                                java.lang.String password)
        POST request that creates a user account and persists it to the database if the username is not already taken, then return a user session key. Otherwise, do nothing and return null.
        Parameters:
        userName - user's username
        firstName - user's first name
        lastName - user's last name
        email - user's email address
        password - user's password
        Returns:
        null if the username is already taken, or a user session key otherwise

      • logIn

        @PostMapping(path="/login")
@ResponseBody
public java.lang.Integer logIn​(@RequestParam
                               java.lang.String userName,
                               @RequestParam
                               java.lang.String password)
        POST request that verifies the user's login credentials. If they are valid, a user session key is returned. Otherwise, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        userName - user's username
        password - user's password
        Returns:
        null if the credentials are invalid, or a user session key otherwise

      • editProfile

        @PostMapping(path="/edit")
@ResponseBody
public boolean editProfile​(@RequestParam
                           java.lang.String userName,
                           @RequestParam
                           java.lang.Integer key,
                           @RequestParam
                           java.lang.String attribute,
                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                           java.lang.String platform,
                           @RequestParam
                           java.lang.String value)
        POST request that edits an attribute of the user profile. If the user's session key is invalid, does nothing and returns false. Otherwise, the user's selected attribute is modified and persisted to the database, then true is returned.
        Parameters:
        userName - user's username
        key - user's session key
        attribute - attribute user would like to edit (e.g. EMAIL)
        platform - optional param specifying the social media platform to be modified; only relevant if attribute is SOCIAL_MEDIA_HANDLE
        value - updated value for the selected attribute
        Returns:
        true if the user's session key and edit request are valid, false otherwise

      • joinStreamQueue

        @PostMapping(path="/joinStreamQueue")
@ResponseBody
public boolean joinStreamQueue​(@RequestParam
                               java.lang.String userName,
                               @RequestParam
                               java.lang.Integer key)
        add user to stream queue
        Parameters:
        userName - userName to add to stream queue
        key - user's key to ensure it is authorized user
        Returns:
        true if user was added to stream queue, false otherwise

      • leaveStreamQueue

        @PostMapping(path="/leaveStreamQueue")
@ResponseBody
public boolean leaveStreamQueue​(@RequestParam
                                java.lang.String userName,
                                @RequestParam
                                java.lang.Integer key)
        remove user from stream queue
        Parameters:

        ture if user was removed from stream queue, false otherwise

        @GetMapping(path="/getAllUsers")
@ResponseBody
public java.lang.Iterable<User> getAllUsers()

        a JSON list of all users in the database.

      • getUser

@ResponseBody
public java.util.Optional<User> getUser​(@RequestParam
                                        java.lang.String userName)
        GET request that returns a JSON representation of a selected user.
        Parameters:
        userName - username of selected username
        Returns:
        JSON representation of the user with specified username
